name: GPv2AllowListAuthentication
description: Gnosis Protocol v2 Access Control Contract.

functionDecorators.name: getStorageAt
functionDecorators.description: Reads `length` bytes of storage in the currents contract.

parameterDecorators.name: offset
parameterDecorators.description: - the offset in the current contract's storage in words to start reading from.

parameterDecorators.name: length
parameterDecorators.description: - the number of words (32 bytes) of data to read.

functionDecorators.name: isSolver
functionDecorators.description: determines whether the provided address is an authenticated solver.

returnDecorators.description: true when prospectiveSolver is an authenticated solver, otherwise false.

functionDecorators.name: simulateDelegatecall
functionDecorators.description: Performs a delegetecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). Catches revert and returns encoded result as bytes.

parameterDecorators.name: targetContract
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

parameterDecorators.name: calldataPayload
parameterDecorators.description: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).

functionDecorators.name: simulateDelegatecallInternal
functionDecorators.description: Performs a delegetecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). Returns encoded result as revert message concatenated with the success flag of the inner call as a last byte.

parameterDecorators.name: targetContract
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

parameterDecorators.name: calldataPayload
parameterDecorators.description: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).
